::: {#hero-heading}
My name is Andrew Kates. I work as a Sport Scientist at the Canadian Sport Institute Pacific in Whistler, British Columbia, Canada. I am also a PhD student in Biomechanics at the University of Victoria.
:::

#### Education

I have been working primarily as a Strength and Conditioning Coach with elite winter sport athletes since 2015. Over the past 10 years I have been fortunate to coach multiple Olympic medalists

#### Experience

On this website you will find my blog, in which I will write primarily about Strength and Conditioning and practical Data Science for sport.
